title: 3 and Out - Middlekauff's Weekend Mailbag: Amari Cut, Broncos Post-Rodgers QB Plan, Combine/Draft Q's, Tua Stock
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Middlekauff's Weekend Mailbag: Amari Cut, Broncos Post-Rodgers QB Plan, Combine/Draft Q's, Tua Stock
description:
John addresses the Cowboys cutting Amari Cooper, and answers listener questions in his weekend Mailbag, including how the Broncos should address their QB situation if Aaron Rodgers stays in Green Bay, how the Chiefs and Bucs should attack the upcoming draft, if Tua can thrive under new HC Mike McDaniel,

Subscribe NOW and follow Middlekauff and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!
